about_the_game: In this game, you will control a cute little paper snake and guide it through a vibrant world of paper mazes and obstacles. Your task is to collect as many paper fruits as possible, while avoiding collision with walls and the tail of the snake itself. As you progress through the game, the maze will become more challenging, and your snake will grow longer, making it harder to navigate without crashing.
detailed_description: In this game, you will control a cute little paper snake and guide it through a vibrant world of paper mazes and obstacles. Your task is to collect as many paper fruits as possible, while avoiding collision with walls and the tail of the snake itself. As you progress through the game, the maze will become more challenging, and your snake will grow longer, making it harder to navigate without crashing.
name: The Paper Arcade - Snake

  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
